posts.post_content:
where have I seen  
  
those tendrils before  
  
**OH MY GOD**  
  
***IT'S RUBY WEAPON***  
  
**  
  
*(SLAMS DOWN L1+R1)*  
  
Opponent: "...uh. Whoa. Relax. All it does is kill off your Soldier tokens."  
  
Yeah that and FLING TWO-THIRDS OF MY FAVORITE CREATURES THIRTEEN THOUSAND MILES INTO THE BACKGROUND WHILE MY ATTACKS FUTILELY BOUNCE OFF THOSE SPIKE HORN THINGS  
  
... *(SCOOPS)*
